author: hship
msg: Use a Browser on the PersonPage.  Clean up some redundant code.

author: hship
msg: Put in provisional support for deploying on the Intranet.

author: hship
msg: Add a chapter to the developer's guide on the Tapestry Script documents.

author: hship
msg: - Set fixed pixel width for Palette buttons.

author: hship
msg: - Change how form element ids are generated.  They will now usually
match the component id, with a numeric suffix to ensure uniqueness.
- Change how the Body component deals with preloaded images to work
better when the same image is used repeatedly.
- Get basic manual ordering working in Palette component.
